name: .UTM File Extension
summary: Learn about .UTM files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a UTM file (and install the virtual machine it contains) on an iOS device using UTM. To do so, install UTM and move your UTM file to the app's Documents directory. The next time you open UTM, your UTM file will appear as a selectable virtual machine.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
